projects.title: Learners-Practice-Test
projects.bodyText:
- Was involved in every piece of this project, got all direction through scrum meetings. 
 - Each answer was saved so the user could leave and come back.
 - Graphs used to show progress of all past tests.

projects.title: Registry Connection's Web App
projects.bodyText:
- All Registry Connections Company Control panel including the companies internal affairs.
 - All questions and answers for Learners-Practice-Test.ca along with all user's answers, scores, payment histories are shown and able to edit and delete.
 - Full lists of all Registry Connectionâ€™s affiliates, driving schools and the examiners with add, edit and delete capabilities.
 - Not a public website.

projects.title: This Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
-  Used creating this as a learning experience and to upskill.
 - First project in React.
 - Laravel Back end soon to come

projects.title: Wordpress Developement
projects.bodyText:
- Used Elementor on all pages.
 - Brainstormed UI/UX in scrum meetings and clients input.
 - Had to upkeep a couple of other non elementor wordpress sites.
